title: Multiplexer Function
description:
EASTER calculates for a given year, the date of Easter Sun￾day. Most religious holidays have a fxed distance from Easter, so that in
the case that Easter is known for a year, these holidays can also be deter￾mined easily. EASTER is also used in the module HOLIDAY to calculate holi￾days.
name: MUX_R2

input.name: IN0
input.description: First input value to be selected from.

input.name: IN1
input.description: Second input value to be selected from.

input.name: A
input.description: Boolean selector that determines which input value to return.

return_value.description: The selected input value based on the condition provided by 'A'.
